OOC: Eh ignore my last post. I typed it up before KSL told me where Hellpeon 
went into.

BIC:

And so he did, nodding to the soldiers as he entered the doorway with 
Hellpeon over it. As he stepped into the new area, he found himself inside an 
arena, metal covering the roof with unbreakable windows surrounding the sides 
for spectators to see through. Silently he watched, and waited for his first 
opponent.

--part1_be.17fcaf66.2894aba9_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
